author: XUANXU
description:
English instruction:
A plugin that enables File-Engine to quickly translate strings
How to use: >tr test --> return "test"
Type ">tr >set" in the search box ---> open the setting window to select the translation language
Enter ">tr >file" in the search box --->Open the file translation window:
File translation can automatically translate each line of text in the file to generate 2 files: withSource.txt withoutSource.txt
withSource.txt: displayed as "original string = translation string"
withoutSource.txt: displayed as "translation string"

中文说明：
一个使File-Engine快速翻译字符串的插件
使用方法：>tr 测试 --> 返回 "test"
在搜索框中输入" >tr >set " ---> 打开设置窗口以选择翻译语言
在搜索框中输入 " >tr >file " --->打开文件翻译功能窗口：
文件翻译可以自动翻译文件中的每一行文本，生成2个文件：withSource.txt withoutSource.txt
withSource.txt ：显示为  "原字符串=翻译字符串"
withoutSource.txt ：显示为  "翻译字符串"
